forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock strikes the early hours of a new day in Downtown San Francisco, a serene calm blankets the city, kissed by a gentle, cool breeze that whispers secrets of the northern seas. The sky, a spacious canvas painted with clear hues, promises a sunny Friday, beckoning the sun to rise. The morning temperatures are poised to cradle the day around a refreshing 61 degrees, dipping slightly as the afternoon unfolds. The winds, modest at 5 to 10 mph, swirl softly, a comforting reminder of the tranquility that resides somewhere between city hustle and nature’s embrace.

Though one may notice hints of marine layer attempting to cling to the fringes, the view will likely unfurl into a clear spectacle, allowing proud glimpses of landmarks and the undulating beauty of the Bay. As the day progresses, it is an opportunity for layers: a light sweater thrown over a favorite shirt—perfect for savoring the flavor of a casual stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a soothing sojourn to a cozy café. With the day’s calm inviting exploration, consider losing oneself in the tactile charm of local bookstores or meandering through vibrant markets—there’s an unassuming joy to be found in the familiar rhythms of daily life.
